name: Interesting Facts, Various Subjects Multiple Choice Quiz  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who or what is ROY G BIV?
questions.correct: A mnemonic for the hues of the rainbow
options: The man who invented the original telescope
A member of Bel Biv Devoe
questions.explanation:
A mnemonic for the hues of the rainbow.

	Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Indigo, Violet.

questions.text: What was the name of Bill Clinton's dog?
How many sacraments are there in the Catholic faith?
What philosopher quoted, 'He who is wisest, admits he knows nothing'?
questions.explanation:
Socrates.

	I feel that his brilliance is expressed in his ever so simplistic, yet profound, works.

questions.text: Which of the following are the names of Frank Sinatra's three children?
questions.explanation:
Nancy, Frankie and Tina.

	In order of their birth all by his first wife Nancy; Nancy, Frankie (jr,) and Tina.

questions.text: Which of the following is an example of 'personification'?
questions.correct: The storm was passionate with anger
questions.explanation:
The storm was passionate with anger.

	Personification represents anything that is not human, but described with human association.

questions.text: Which of the following is a synonym to the word 'excavate'?

questions.explanation:
Albanian.

	It is an informal way of saying hello or goodbye to a peer in the Albanian language.

questions.text: What river makes a stretch across the state of Missouri traveling southeast from Kansas City to St. Louis?
How many licks did Mr. Owl say it took him to get to the center of a tootsie roll pop?
